dcmst_construction_algorithms.increase_connectivity module¶

dcmst_construction_algorithms.increase_connectivity.increase_connectivity(tree: ndarray, degree_constraints: ndarray, current_isl_number: ndarray, cost_matrix: ndarray, total_satellites: int) → ndarray[source]¶

Gradually and greedily adds ISLs to graph to increase the connectivity between satellites until no more ISLs can be established without breaking constraints.

Parameters:

  • tree – a degree-constrained minimum spanning tree of the graph

  • degree_constraints – list that describes the maximum number of ISLs each satellite can establish at a given point in time

  • current_isl_number – list that describes the current degree of each satellite within the network

  • cost_matrix – costs assigned to each edge within the graph that represents the satellite network

  • total_satellites – the number of satellites within the network

Returns:

a network that contains the tree spanning the network, as well as other edges added such that the degree constraint of each vertex is not broken
